description: Lot 161 Suffrage Cornell U. Spring Day banner w/'WIM-ENZ VOTZ!',  dishwashing on either side,  'Dr. Anna P-Shaw' in front,  female cop & sign 'Cuss,  Wimmen,  Cuss!' surround her,  cross-dressers,  pu-1911 / Ithaca,  N.Y.,  see wob,  Rare,  VF
